[0;32mwhoami, whoami, Service (v1) to be added.[0m

helm_content_diff.name: whoami
helm_content_diff.after:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: whoami
  namespace: whoami
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http-whoami
    port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 8000
  selector:
    app: whoami
  sessionAffinity: None
  type: ClusterIP

helm_content_diff.name: whoami
helm_content_diff.after:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: whoami
  name: whoami
  namespace: whoami
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: whoami
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: whoami
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WHOAMI_NAME
          value: alwijdaiwd
        - name: WHOAMI_PORT_NUMBER
          value: "8000"
        image: traefik/whoami:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: whoami
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: ".25"
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: ".1"
            memory: 64Mi
